item.title: Admin Builder
item.description:
The service

It looks like this:

Available at http://rootabout.com/admin-builder

Here is where you can add metaboxes (as many as you want, rename and position how you want, in any order that you can sort at any time), to posts and pages and add fields (textbox, textarea, select of multiple types, radio buttons, date picker, time picker, color picker, media upload button). Again, unlimited, in any order, configurable.

In the top right, if you click settings, you will see the exported jSon String that you can copy and paste into the…

WordPress Plugin

It looks like this:

Get it here: https://wordpress.org/plugins/admin-builder/. This needs to be installed in a wordpress site and activated. Then in the plugin settings, import the jSon string, and that’s it.
